entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kitimat Forest Ave 11:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 4.9°C
Wind: SSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
